client

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The ConnectionManager instance manages the connection to the Watchneighbours server, connecting and communicating with ConnectionBalancer and SubUrbInterface instances
    Author:
    Luca Landa

                 throws UserNotConfirmedException
        Tries to logIn into a Watchneighbour's account
        Parameters:
        userID - user's ID
        password - user's account password
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        UserNotConfirmedException - if the specified user has not been confirmed yet

      • tryConfirmRegistration

        public boolean tryConfirmRegistration(java.lang.String userID,
                                      java.lang.String password,
                                      java.lang.String registrationCode)
        Tries to confirm a registration, after a logIn operation failed for an account that had not been confirmed yet
        Parameters:
        userID - the user's account ID
        password - the user's account password
        registrationCode - the user's account registration code, to confirm the registration
        Returns:
        success of the operation

      • tryAccessWithoutAccount

        public boolean tryAccessWithoutAccount(java.lang.String suburb,
                                       java.lang.String city)
                                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Tries to access the application without an account, to the suburb (and city) selected
        Parameters:
        suburb - the suburb to see in the application
        city - the city to see in the application
        Returns:
        success of the operation
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to Watchneighbours server

      • tryAddingSubUrbHandler

        public SubUrbInterface tryAddingSubUrbHandler(java.lang.String suburb,
                                              java.lang.String city)
                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                              java.rmi.NotBoundException
        Tries to connect to another SubUrbInterface instance of Watchneighbours server, to get its reports and updates
        Parameters:
        suburb - the new suburb to add to the displayed area
        city - the city of the new suburb
        Returns:
        SubUrbInterface instance of the new suburb's handler on the server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to the ConnectionBalancer instance on the server
        java.rmi.NotBoundException - if cannot find the searched suburb

        Checks for an userID availability asking to the stub (ConnectionBalancer instance)
        Parameters:
        userID - the userID to verify
        Returns:
        availability of the userID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if cannot connect to the ConnectionBalancer instance on the server
